channel.title: Level 135 Max Level

item.title: Level 135 Max Level
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

i have this

	public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
		int points = 0;
		int output = 0;

		for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 135; lvl++) {
			points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
			output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
			if (output >= exp) {
				return lvl;
			}
		}
		return 99;
	}

So it says 135, but it only says 99/135

How do i make it go up to 135/135

Read full topic
